reviews.title: Outside Bar!
reviews.text: Its a bit like a mens bar back home, been updated recently outside roof terrace to sit and chill. Food okay.Service excellant, staff so pleasant

reviews.title: Too much cigarette smoke
reviews.text: A sports bar but too many TV screens showing different sports

reviews.title: Grim sports bar!
reviews.text: Very basic shed of a bar, good TV coverage of major sports etc, barfood OK

reviews.title: Almost like being back home!
reviews.text: I love Sherazad! Beer, peanuts, sport, atmosphere and smoke (even as a non-smoker this is crucial to the "pub" theme). Service is brilliant and the Ramada burger is awesome - only downer is the chips (fries) are horrible! But again - I love Sherazad! Hurrah!

reviews.title: a Wetherspoon from 20 years ago
reviews.text: If your idea of a good time is being surrounded by low-rent Brits in a venue that contains more smoke than breathable air, then this is the place for you. Lots of screens for the football, but they don't have the channel for the cricket.

reviews.title: Not bad break
reviews.text: A shame all round as this place has the potential for being great.

reviews.title: Bog standard hotel drinking hole
reviews.text: The place is old, looks like an old hall crowded noisy. The food is average, beer selection is average. But all in all, it is ok.

reviews.title: snacks and sports
reviews.text: The Ramadas version of a British pub/sports bar. OK, but nothing special. Good outside seating for the warm evenings though.

reviews.title: Nice Spot!
reviews.text: Was great to catch football on TV and had a decent snack menu. Service is either waiter or at the bar. Only critisism is it's very smokey
